Communications.NoticeEvents:
The scheme prepares students for graduate recruitment and selection processes; and develops interpersonal/employability skills. that employers expect.

Your mentor will offer constructive, developmental support on applications for graduate level employment, work experience, volunteering and networking opportunities.

Final years please email: J.MacNaught@hull.ac.uk
The exam timetable for Semester 2 exams is now available from Pocket Campus
